name: Teesh Unleashed
description:
The latest in a series of games inspired from a ttrpg, a series that is ever increasing in scope and ambition. This latest entry follows Teesh in a procedurally generated platformer. Now filled with competition missing from Kaz Deliverance; you can race your friends to get the best time. This game had several planned features that we never got around to, turns out procedural generation takes a considerable amount of effort. Look forward to the related asset pack. https://celestialscholar.itch.io/brick-tiles

 

We sincerely hope you enjoy this latest entry ^_^.
